titleStmt.title: The tryals, convictions & sentence of Titus Oates upon two indictments for willful, malicious, and corrupt perjury : at the Kings-Bench-Barr at Westminster before the Right Honourable George Lord Jeffreys ... upon Friday the 8th and Saturday the 9th days of May, anno Domini 1685 ...
titleStmt.author: Oates, Titus, 1649-1705.
England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Sare ... and are to be sold by Randal Taylor,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
